mainSequence.step: DMPTool requests resource requirements input from IT Resources Estimation
Researcher inputs project details (data volume, processing power, etc.) to IT Resources Estimation
IT Resources Estimation returns resource estimates to DMPTool
DMPTool initiates cost calculation with Cost Calculation Module
Cost Calculation Module requests institutional pricing data from Institutional Systems
Institutional Systems returns pricing data to Cost Calculation Module
Cost Calculation Module returns cost estimate to DMPTool
DMPTool displays cost estimate and resource needs to Researcher
